Player History
Injured on 8/18/1975 with a Pulled Elbow Ligament, out for 3 weeks...
Traded from Los Angeles to Philadelphia on 1/31/1976 (Going to LA: P D. Spillner. Going to PHI: 3B M. Kakefu, RF J. Youngblood)...
Had first career hit on 4/1/1976, off Gene Garber (CIN)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/8/1976, off Vince Colbert (STL)...
Injured on 5/24/1978 with a Strained Tricep Muscle, out for 3 weeks...
Injured on 10/2/1978 with a Tight Shoulder, out for 1-2 weeks...
Injured on 4/18/1979 with a Hyper Extended Elbow, out for 1-2 weeks...
Had 5 hits with 5 RBI against Los Angeles on 6/2/1980...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/9/1980, hitting .464 with 3 HR, 9 RBI...
Was selected to the 1981 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/25/1981, hitting .455 with 3 HR, 12 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/2/1982, hitting .667 with 1 HR, 11 RBI...
